length.description: Length, which is represented as height in portrait direction and length in landscape direction, can be percentages, values with RPX units, etc
length.description_zh: 长度，竖向时表现为高度，横向时表现为长度，可以为百分比，带rpx单位的值等

direction.description: The direction of the line, row-horizontal, col-vertical

hair-line.description: Whether or not to display thin lines

margin.description: The spacing between the line and the up, down, left, and right elements, in the form of strings, such as "30rpx", "20rpx 30rpx"
margin.description_zh: 线条与上下左右元素的间距，字符串形式，如"30rpx"、"20rpx 30rpx"
